display_information.name: MWD Assistant
display_information.description: AI-powered internal assistant for MW Design Studio
display_information.long_description: Your team's intelligent assistant for managing clients, projects, and creative workflows. Chat naturally about branding strategy, website design, social media, copywriting, research, and project management. Integrates with Notion, Google Workspace, and multiple AI models including Claude, Gemini, and GPT-4.

assistant_view.assistant_description: Your team's AI assistant for managing clients, projects, and creative workflows. Ask about branding strategy, research industries, draft emails, manage Notion workspace, and more. Can't access external websites directly or send emails without confirmation.
